"Opsi": "L/Rボタン機能入れ替え（カスタム時無効）"
"START/SELECTボタン機能入れ替え(カスタム時無効)"

"Menentukan radar map akan diputar ketika
mengikuti arah orientasi kamera."

"Aktif/nonaktif pemutaran video
in-game (seperti monitor yang ada di ARKS Lobby).
※Dibutuhkan buka ulang pso2 agar diterapkan."
"Jika diaktifkan, bahasa kasar tidak akan ditampilkan pada in-game."

"Pilih bagaimana lock-on berkerja.
Menentukan untuk lock-on dari
meng-klik 1x tombol, atau menahan tombol."

"Menentukan bagaimana mengganti palette.

Pilih untuk berganti ketika tombol ditahan."

"Kamu dapat mengatur interval untuk penghindaran
menggunakan ([W]/[A]/[S]/[D]) pada keyboard."

"Menentukan bagaimana penyimpanan pengaturan party,
ketika setelah logout dan ganti block.
Pengaturan party tersimpan setelah keluar dari game."
"Menentukan bagaimana mengganti sasaran lock-on menggunakan right stick."

"Kamu dapat mengatur icon navigasi ARKS Road
tampil/tidak, yang merupakan tujuanmu selanjutnya."
"Mentukan untuk otomatis mengambil Meseta ketika didekatmu."
"Memilih bagaimana nama party lainnya ditunjukkan sebagai biru gelap atau putih."

"Warna yang ditampilkan pada HP bar ketika
menyerang menggunakan Strike, Ranged atau Tech damage."

"Menentukan nama party dasar
(jika nama party tidak ditentukan)."

"Memilih otomatis block pemula atau acak
ketika menggunakan karakter Lv.20↓."
"Memilih bagaimana untuk menampilkan subpallete yang terpilih."

"Memilih rarity ketika notifikasi rare drop
akan ditampilkan ketika rare item jatuh."

"Ketika 13★ atau lebih item jatuh, pengaturan ini
akan menaruh langsung ke inventory-mu daripada
berada di area untuk menghindari kelupaan mengambil."

"倉庫端末や、マイショップ出品時、
NPCショップでのアイテム売買において、
倉庫UIが表示された時の初期カーソル位置を設定します。"
"Mengatur tampilan HP bar pada pet dan status icon."

"Ketika E-Trials terjadi,
radar map akan diperbesar sementara."

"Aktif/nonaktif menampilkan jendela
ketika ada undangan masuk team."

"通知メッセージの表示数について、
単一に限定するか複数表示するか設定します。"

"おすすめクエストを受注したとき、
おすすめオーダーのウインドウを表示するかを設定します。"

"Konfigurasi notifikasi akan ditampilkan
ketika member party memungut rare item."

"プレミアムセットの有効期限が7日を切っていたら
ログイン時に通知するかを設定します。"

"Aktif/nonaktifkan jendela konfirmasi
ketika ketua party memulai match-making multi-block quest."
"ゲーム内カメラ左右回転速度"
"ゲーム内カメラ上下回転速度"

"Ketika menggunakan mouse, pilih prioritas untuk
kamera atau kursor mouse."
"Channel untuk ditampilkan di Log Chat \"Tampilkan Semua\""

"Mengatur untuk menampilkan interface
(termasuk windows) dalam screenshot."

"If you have Auto Words set,
choosing \"Disable\" will prevent
them from triggering."
"Turns on the Auto Words of Other Players."

"If enabled, all keyboard buttons will
only be used for chat.
※[ScrollLock] will change this setting at any time."
"Select what content to display in the log window's \"View All\" tab."
"Set whether to show Auto Words in the chatlog."

"Turn off the ability for the Scroll Lock key to toggle direct chat.

If direct chat is not working properly, try turning ON
this setting - There's a possibility that will fix it."
"Select whether to show or hide symbol arts."

"When you log in,
send Login Call to friends."

"Sets the background color of the chat
that corresponds to who you're talking to."

"Choose whether to display indicators
for incapacitated party members.
Does not apply to Friend/Support/Free Partners."

"Choose whether to allow other players to
see an indicator if you are incapacitated.
If a player has this setting turned off,
you will not receive the indicator."
"Set whether to display the Player ID name or the Character name in Team Chat and Whispers."

"This will reset all windows to their initial positions and default sizes.
Are you sure you wish to continue?"
"This will reset the size and location of all windows."

"Humanoid-type and Cast bodies are synchronized.
However, you can individually edit them by
selecting \"Discrete Physique Editing\"."

"キャラクタークリエイトおよびエステで選択する
ヘアスタイル・ヘッドパーツ・アクセサリーウィンドウの
タイプを設定します。"

"種族キャストの場合でも、着るコスチュームによってはヒト型の体型に
なりますが、この場合の「ヒト型の体型」と「キャスト型の体型」を
自動的に同期するか、個別に編集できるようにするかを選択できます。"
"Select the format to use for screenshots."

"Set whether to show the interface
(including windows) in screenshots."

"Enable or disable effect lighting.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Enable or disable terrain lighting effects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Creates an effect on the screen when
viewing very bright objects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Simulate natural atmospheric blurring for distant objects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Enable or disable representation of sunbeams.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Enable or disable the blur effect.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Enable or disable anti-aliasing.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Enable or disable soft particle effects.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Darken the shadows cast by edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Dim the screen's edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Adjust the amount of light emitted by the camera, affecting the brightness of the screen.
Setting to 0 will improve performance slightly."

"Adjust overall brightness, color, and contrast for each field.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Adjust amount of light applied to objects' edges.
Enabled when graphics quality is set to 6.
Disabling will improve performance slightly."

"Adjust intensity of light produced by certain effects.
Setting to \"Reduced\" will dim these effects."

"Allow resolution to be automatically decreased in order to maintain a smooth framerate.
Disabling will allow framerate to drop during heavy processing."

"Set how many player characters to
display in full detail, such as showing equipment
Lowering the count will improve performance."

"Set the quality of water reflection.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"Set the quality of shadow rendering.
Lowing the value will improve performance slightly."

"Set the screen's brightness.
Lowering the value will reduce the brightness of the entire screen."

"Set how many Photon Blasts to display.
Displaying fewer will ease processing."

"Set the volume of the video displayed
on the ARKS monitors installed in the lobby and for some cutscenes as well."

"Set whether to play sound when
game window is not in focus."

"3. Calibration test for right stick: Up"

While holding up on the right stick please press
$(0)."
"4. Calibration test for right stick: Left"
"Now, while holding <c ff007f>left<c> on the right stick<green> please press <c>$(0)."

"This will determine if the [Rear left button] is a trigger.
(This only works for analog controllers)
Please press the button that is glowing in the figure below.

If nothing happens when you press it, the controller isn't analog.
Please press $(0) to perform button configuration on the next screen."

"This will determine if the [Rear right button] is a trigger.
(This only works for analog controllers)
Please press the button that is glowing in the figure below.

If nothing happens when you press it, the controller isn't analog.
Please press $(0) to perform button configuration on the next screen."

"This will reset the controller to its defaults.
Continue?"
"This pad does not support automatic configuration."

"Here, you can match the buttons on your controller with the
GUI buttons in the game, in case any are detected incorrectly.

Press the [Change] button, then match the
[Display Button] with the button on your controller."
"The gamepad will be set automatically. You can also manually configure the gamepad."
